description: It explodes, dealing D20 damage within a 6’ radius.
It opens a nearby door or access point.
It projects a cosmetic hologram on the user, changing their appearance.
It activates a piece of technology within the Site.
It quickly heats up or cools down.
It grants the user a random Talent as long as they remain within the Site.
It shocks the user, dealing D20 damage.
It sprays the user with a toxic liquid which destroys a random item.
It shows the user horrific visions of their close ones being burnt alive. (+1 Trauma)
It soothes the user, who knows everything’s going to be okay. (-10 Stress)
